summary: This is an email chain discussing the trial date for Ghislaine Maxwell's case, set for November 29, 2021. It also mentions that a congressional office (Rep. Frankel's) plans to wait until after the trial before pushing for any congressional hearing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case for which the trial date is being discussed.

persons.name: Frankel
persons.context: Mentioned as a congressional representative whose office communicated they would wait until after Maxwell's trial before pushing for a congressional hearing.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Date Set
events.description: The trial date for the Ghislaine Maxwell case is confirmed as November 29, 2021.

events.title: Congressional Office Communication on Hearing
events.description: Representative Frankel's office communicates they will wait until after Ghislaine Maxwell's trial before pushing for any congressional hearing.

keyFacts: The trial date for Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal case was set for November 29, 2021.
U.S. Representative Frankel's office indicated they would wait until after Maxwell's trial before advocating for a congressional hearing.
The email chain shows coordination or information sharing about the legal and political timeline surrounding the Maxwell case.
